original_title: Sajith prevented from active participation in COPF
original_body_lines: Leader of the Opposition Sajith Premadasa was prevented from active participation in the Committee on Public Finance (COPF) as the majority of members in the committee decided he can only observe.
Ten members of the COPF voted in favour of the proposal that the Leader of the Opposition could only observe and cannot participate actively, a member of the committee told the Daily Mirror.
However, Sajith Premadasa remained in the room but only as an observer. (Yohan Perera)
